5.model2: The universal belief is, that a person sucked by a vampire becomes a vampire himself, arid sucks in turn.

43.model1: The old man sat on the lawn, surrounded by a small streamlet that glided away, grapes, oranges, and limes clustered together on its borders, and under the shade of two large myrtle bushes, a marble seat with an ornamental wooden back was placed, on which we were told, the lord passed his evenings and nights, reading, writing, and talking to himself. "I suppose," said the old man, "praying" for he was very devoted, "and always attended church twice a week, blessed Sundays."
43.model2: On the left hand as we entered the house, a small streamlet glided away, grapes, oranges, and limes were clustering together on it’s borders, and under the shade of two large myrtle bushes, a marble seat with an ornamental wooden back was placed, on which we were told, the lord passed merry of his evenings and nights till twelve o’clock, reading, writing, and talking to himself. I suppose, he was very devout, and always attended our church twice a week, besides Sundays.
43.ground_truth: On the left hand as we entered the house, a small streamlet glided away, grapes, oranges and limes were clustering together on its borders, and under the shade of two large myrtle bushes, a marble seat with an ornamental wooden back was placed, on which we were told, the lord passed many of his evenings and nights till twelve o'clock, reading, writing, and talking to himself. "I suppose," said the old man, "praying" for he was very devout, "and always attended our church twice a week, besides Sundays."
